page.title: 08 RELIGION
page.content:
RELIGION
THERE ARE 4 CHURCHES IN GOREBRIDGE NAMELY GOREBRIDGE PARISH CHURCH,BUILT 1837,STRUTHERS MEMORIAL CHURCH,1881,ST MARGARETS ROMAN CATHOLIC CHAPEL,1904,AND THE UNITD FREE CHURCH,1936.THE TOTAL ROLL OF THE CHURCHES IS 1485,MADE UP,IN ORDER,OF 850,30,565 AND 40,BUT THE NUMBERS ATTENDING REGULARLY ARE 160,30,300,34. THE POPULATION OF THE AREA IN THE LAST CENSUS WAS JUST UNDER 6000.MASS IS SAID DAILY IN THE CHAPEL BUT THE OTHER CHURCHES TEND TO BE USED FOR SUNDAY WORSHIP.THE HALLS OF THESE CHURCHES ARE WELL USED FOR WEEKNIGHT ACTIVITIES AND CHURCH ORGANISATIONS.CHURCH MARRIAGES HAVE DECLINED FROM 40 IN 1980 TO 19 IN 1984.REGISTRAR OFFICE MARRIAGES HAVE ALSO FALLEN FROM 23 TO 12 OVER THE SAME PERIOD.
